description: Epel Felmier is a 16-year-old student at Night Raven College, a secondary boarding school.  He hails from Harveston and his family runs an apple farm. Despite his initially shy and delicate appearance, Epel possesses a fiery temper and blunt honesty.  He's skilled in apple carving and excels in flying class. His friendship with Ace Trappola is complex, marked by both rivalry and a developing bond.
